text: A precious metal is a type of metal that is worth a lot of money compared to most other metals. Some precious metals are gold, silver, and platinum. Many pieces of jewelry are made out of precious metals. The precious metal worth the most amount of money for the same mass is Rhodium.Precious Metal Prices Index taxfreegold.co.uk (HTML). Accessed 19 November 2006. ==Related pages== *Alchemy *Bullion *Noble metal ==References== Category:Geology Category:Metals
title: Precious metal
